alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Upper Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:29PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Grant County through 500 PM MDT... At 429 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gila Hot Springs, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gila Hot Springs and Portions of the Gila Wilderness. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Upper Gila River Valley
